website_summaries.verdict: This all-in-one model includes a clear, vivid LED display and the fastest processing speeds available in any Acer model.
pros: The 23.8-inch LED screen fits well in most work spaces and offers a clear, vivid picture for both documents and images
An 8th generation Intel i5 processor and impressive 12 GB of RAM means both download and file sharing speeds are fast
cons: The computer includes a lot of factory-installed software, which many users may not want, and which slows the computer at start up

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but slow hard drive that impacts whole system
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Installed a 500GB SSD and now this computer is very fast. Too bad Acer went with a cheap, slow HD as stock for this. If you plan on having a descent anti-virus or do much beyond basic computing, highly recommend upgrading to SSD hard drive. ORIGINAL: Had high hopes but the hard drive on this is really disappointing. Basic antivirus slows it way down and makes it act like a 5 year old computer. I had to order an ssd hard drive to make this act like it should brand new. I have built PCs for years and owned several brand name PCs too. This has been pretty disappointing after one week
customer_reviews.author: K. BALL

customer_reviews.title: Great All in One - Very Snappy Performance!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great All in One PC! I've only had it up and running a few days, but so far so good! It is very fast and has seriously cleaned up my desktop-no more cables and stuff above and under desk. It runs very quiet despite the fact that it doesn't have an SSD, and is an excellent option for word processing, spread sheets, email, web browsing, etc...obv if you're a serious gamer or video editor look elsewhere, but all in all a great machine! Would Recommend! Pros -Fast performance -Quiet -Visually appealing -Good Value Cons -built in speakers aren't great (were you expecting them to be?) -Included Wireless keyboard and mouse aren't great -not terrible though
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the previous model
customer_reviews.text: They removed the cd drive, and the touch screen and filled it up with bloatware. The previous years versions is decades better than this one. Very bummed I can't get the old version anymore
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worthless All-In-One
customer_reviews.text: Cons: -Processing Speeds -Picture Display -Quality of Construction Pros: -Free Returns
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: JUST NOT RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased based on the ratings and the features but, was very disappointed with the performance. All seemed well initially, not as fast as expected but, tolerable. Then a simple win 10 automatic update took 2 hours (it took 2 min on another pc). I restored to a factory state twice with no improvement in performance. Since all of the reviews were positive I may have just received a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: MRM

customer_reviews.title: System died on 12/12/19
customer_reviews.text: System purchased 10/22/19. System died 12/1219. Lasted not even 13 months! Acer solution was to whipe drive of data. No real support. Motherboard went bad. Cannot recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Specter Jim 48

customer_reviews.title: Terrific computer! So easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Our only complaint is the directions are pretty sparse. The dongle for the mouse is stored inside the mouse battery compartment. We had a very frustrating day trying to locate it as it wasn't in any of the packaging and no word of it being in the mouse in the directions! After that, it's been smooth sailing!
customer_reviews.author: Mareealis

customer_reviews.title: Not really an "all in one"
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is fine, but the sound is not good. There is no cd/dvd drive... wish I had known that before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: catch 22
customer_reviews.text: dongle was not in my box very disappointed I can't use it until I buy this adapter
customer_reviews.author: buggirl

customer_reviews.title: oderded twice and didn't got the keyboard  and mouse sensor.
customer_reviews.text: i have ordered twice this computer but both the times i doesnt have the keyboard and mouse sensor
customer_reviews.author: Ankit

customer_reviews.title: All the usb posrts are back side
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good. This computer have no USB port on the left or right side of the monitor. All the ports are back side of the monitor. Very inconvenient. I am planning to by a external USB hub. I bought this PC to avoid cables. Other than this everything is fine except the speed. I have another all in one dell PC with i3 and lesser ROM is more faster than this PC. Also key board have no caps lock indicator.
customer_reviews.author: Mrittunjai Srivastava

customer_reviews.title: Bad Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This computer is slower than the 10 year old virus infected one that I bought this one to replace. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Great value. Setup took a while.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the end results. However, set-up was a bit difficult because I wanted to use SoftWorks for security instead of Norton, and a MicroSoft home office bundle from a cheaper source, and I was converting from Windows7. Finally finished, and my husband is VERY pleased with the results--especially the higher speed of Internet searches.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This meets my needs well, meaning I don't need a gaming PC but a quick, functional machine for home use. I use it mostly for photo editing and printing. It couldn't be easier to set up. I downloaded some photo software quickly and it functions well.
customer_reviews.author: The Guy from Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, dependable. One problem, but my fault!
customer_reviews.text: Love this PC...it's everything I need, except...I forgot to note that it has no CD/DVD drive. I had to buy one, but that arrived today, it's very small, and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have never been a fan of all in 1 computers, but this one is awesome! The size is perfect and love that you can use voice to control. Speed test are great and video quality are above and beyond expectations .
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Morin

customer_reviews.title: Set up is a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted to buy an all-in-one computer for some time but I was worried that I would not be able to set it up. Well - duh. This was SOOOOOO easy. And I love the 23" screen.
customer_reviews.author: D. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Desktop
customer_reviews.text: This all-in-one desktop was a snap to set up. Just plug and play. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: beej62

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 Mo. but so far no issues. I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I now have on this computer for approximately two months with no issues. I do not have to reboot I press the on button and it comes on. If you had a computer where you had issues you know that that’s a positive. I bought this for my retail store. This computers main job is to host Quickbooks for inventory and invoicing, Financing and Internet research for my product. It’s only been a short two months but so far no issues
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Dover

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer and the fact that it doesn’t have a tower. I am not a gamer so i didn’t buy it for that because it would not be good for that. It’s perfect for what i need. I wish i’d Realized that it isn’t touch screen but thats my fault and i shouldve known because it was a super good price. You’ll love it. The mouse and keyboard are wireless so thats also a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Diana H.

customer_reviews.title: You get a little less than what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: . . . in terms of speed. Performance is sluggish at times, it clearly struggles with Windows 10. Has more than enough RAM, so it's likely a processor issue, combined with a platter hard drive and not a SSD. Also, if you want to use a different keyboard than the one supplied (and who wouldn't) , the mouse has to be replaced ALSO, because otherwise the USB receiver seems to pick up random signals or noise, and this leads to unpredictable behavior on the part of the OS. On the plus side, the display is gorgeous. Wait until this Acer goes on sale, or find a comparable All-In-One with a bit better performance, my advice.
customer_reviews.author: EJAN

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer to upgrade from my previous Acer all-in-one that had a few limitations, being 4 years old. This computer was easy to set up. The quality and speed are excellent. I'm very pleased with my purchase. I use the computer for surfing the net, online shopping, budgeting, and the usual home uses.
customer_reviews.author: Wendeysk.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth of Money
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review after using 8 months, many many issues going on this all in one.1- rebooting it self (no updates installed) 2- External drives are disconnected automatically, 3- USB 3.0 is not at correct speed, 4- lag in response time. I wasted my money and I do NOT recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Beemboy

customer_reviews.title: Large size and Windows 10 problem
customer_reviews.text: The unit was really big and startup seem kind a slow. Had problems the unit would crash and problems with Intel USB controller trying to assign extra drive letter automatically E:? Or G: to recovery partition. Looks like a Windows 10 ver 1803 from other online sites.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Coville

customer_reviews.title: Installation is a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Clarity is awesome and it is easy to use. Much faster than my old computer.
customer_reviews.author: Bomba

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as ordered, good value.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. Very easy and quick set-up. Keyboard and mouse work perfectly fine. No complaints thus far. NOT a gaming cpu; but a great cpu for usual tasks, inet, surfing, and school. Takes up VERY little space, one cord, which is why I bought it. VERY happy with purchase so far. IMPRESSED with how small the entire setup is. Basically a desktop, miniscule in size and waaay better than a laptop. Takes up less space than a laptop too. PERFECT for s student or small-medium business.
customer_reviews.author: john mills

customer_reviews.title: Its great that there are no cables to attatch the keybord or the mouse to conect them
customer_reviews.text: The sound is excellent ,the screen is excellent but if you want to scan a document from the printer to the computer you need to detach the web cam cable and then reset the setting to try and get a scanned document transferred across. its probably me but the pictures I take with the camera are never as clear as I would like them to be. My only other issue is that trying to send an Email to Amazon regarding a delivery would be much easier if an Email Address accepted Emails sent by me. Kind Regards as always Andrew Johnston Green Valley Block B Apartment1 DIOS 112 Tersefanou 7562 Larnaca Cyprus. akbjohnston1@outlook.com
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Best All in ones for work
customer_reviews.text: These computers are exactly what you need for the office, lots of Ram and a simple light design. I recommend upgrading the Hard drive to an SSD and you will have yourself an all in one well worth over the price you pay. Doing the mirroring and upgrading to the SSD is quite simple and if your tech savvy, you'll only spend money on the SSD
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: All in one PC for Home
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love the large screen, the brightness and the ease in which we can bring up what we need, the only bad thing is it is slow to start if you totally turn it off, we however keep it on the sleep mode, and it is quick to turn on this way. Very good computer, for what we need, only solitaire for games and e-mail and internet is all we use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Guineal Redman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a home office
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer because I had an Acer PC AIO AZ-1620-AR308 W8 since 2012 and it was excellent, so I wanted the same brand but in a newer version. The image is very good and now with the wireless mouse and keyboard it will be nicer to work with it. I am a translator and use it for my work, and also for social media and for graphic design (Corel, Photoshop, etc.) for which I needed more capacity. I'm very glad with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Carrizo

customer_reviews.title: Speedy machine
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very happy with my new Acer, it's a learning process moving from, Windows 7 to 10, but I'm getting there. I would have rated this 5 star, but Miscrosoft decided to remove Mahjong Titans from the games and I've yet to figure out how to add it on. Bright, clear picture, very fast and overall an excellent home computer.
customer_reviews.author: JudiAnne

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Cheerful All In One
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought the one with the SSD but then I paid $200 but have to wait 1-15 sec for it to start-up. So what, the screen is great and for what I use it it has more than enough power and storage. It is a nice looking computer. The sound is not that great, but I use my Bluetooth speakers anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jens F. Poschet

customer_reviews.title: Great computer, reasonly priced. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this computer. It has few wires and runs very smoothly and quietly. Easy to set and to use, once I realized the mouse connector was located inside The screen is very bright with a shade option at night, which I like. Also, the wireless keyboard and mouse work seamlessly with the pc.
customer_reviews.author: Light Wings

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year / No help from Acer
customer_reviews.text: It was a really good PC for right at a year. Only used for work... no junk or anything on it. Took really good care of it. It was doing a recent windows update shut down and wouldn't come back on. Called Acer and said it was a hard drive issue... I was out of warranty by 4 days. Wouldnt help with anything. I'm sure if I would have lied about the purchase date I would have a new PC right now. So much for being honest these days, doesn't get you much. Also a year ago I paid $599. Crazy how they jacked the price up $300.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, screen is excellent. Fast processor and plenty of memory for day to day tasks. Only thing keeping it from being a 5 star review is the older style slow hard drive. For general use and web it is great. The wireless reception could be a bit better but, not a problem here
customer_reviews.author: Dale Bishop

customer_reviews.title: How to improve speed
customer_reviews.text: Well I deleted all the factory bloatware to help speed it up. Unfortunately that did not make much difference, as it still takes around 73 seconds to power on, which is much slower than 13 year old computer. I understand that buying and installing a SSD will fix most of this, but that is another $150.00. If anyone has any suggestions, before I return it, I welcome the feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Brady L. Kerkman

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just received this during holiday season, so it's new, but it's working great so far. A little difficult to program. You also will have to purchase, an office suite and a Norton package which will increase the discounted price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn of Philly

customer_reviews.title: Not a gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: If you want to play games spend the money on a good gaming computer. This is a barebones computer for doing routine, day-to-day computing and internet surfing. We use it for the Microsoft suite, Google products, internet searches, shopping and such and it works very well. The keyboard and mouse are HORRIBLE! Thankfully a good keyboard and mouse is relatively cheap.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Highly Disappointed this time in Acer
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Acer , and i was under the impression that it would be as reliable and dependable as my last one that lasted 5 years without any problems. However since receiving this machine i have had numerous problems, Ethernet adapter keeps cutting out and leaving me with no internet, the Black screen everytime a video tries to play on Edge, the adobe flash player issue that keeps repeating itself over and over..there just seems to be no end in sight for my problems... i spend more time trying to resolve my PC rather than using it..i honestly think this may be my LAST Acer machine i purchase... sorry.......
customer_reviews.author: A. Chong

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month the screen goes black when I scroll over a video
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Do Not Recommend This Desktop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this desktop in 2019. Within months it made a grinding noise. It was within warranty, so Amazon refunded my money and I purchased another identical one in May 2019. This one presented another problem - the screen would go black for several seconds, sometimes minutes, then retur to normal. I sent it to Acer for repair. They found no issues with it and returned it to me. It does the same thing. It is out of warranty, so I am stuck with a one year old $599 desktop that is unreliable. Amazon offered no options. I do not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty nervous about buying a computer online but I am very happy with this purchase. Very easy to assemble no fuss, you don't have to be a member of the Geek Squad to get it going! Just a fair warning to those of you (like me) who have kinda fat fingers, the keyboard is crazy small.
customer_reviews.author: txsly

customer_reviews.title: Good Desktop, NEEDS SSD
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly fine desktop computer, BUT it absolutely NEEDS an SSD installed to give it some decent speed. Out of the box this computer acts like an 4-5 year old CP, very disappointing and frustrating! After the installation of a good SSD, you end up with the computer you originally hoped for. Other than that issue this has been a good reliable computer, it won't WOW anybody, but it gets the job done. Would I recommend it? I would say look around, you can probably find something better in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: D. Downing

customer_reviews.title: Poor processing and R&R by supplier!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, it did not work. Being an A1 Computer Technician, I diagnosed the failure as both the keyboard and onboard interface. I could tell by the packaging it was previously used & returned, it wasn't noted by Law when advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. O

customer_reviews.title: Bought it to replace my HP
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what it is, but every HP I have ever owned, craps out to put it mildly. So I bought this Acer, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product. Extreme fast and good image quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved my new Acer set. It's very fast and has a really good image quality. To improve the performance I added a SSD M2 nvme and keeping the original HDD that creates a monster (of course, based on his price). I'm enjoying it very much. To add this SSD you need to open the case on the back and remove a lot of screws. I tried to play CS Go but it wasn't so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast Computer For Compiling Code!
customer_reviews.text: This computer WORKS GREAT----fast for C compilation and we have it partitioned for both Ubuntu Linux and Windows 10! The order is only missing the "wireless USB Dongle" for the wireless keyboard/mouse where my brother Chris had been using a plugin keyboard/mouse from another computer. I HAD TO USE THE ORDER RETURN to report the missing dongle because the webpage for Amazon Expert customer service wouldnt allow me to enter any phone numbers .
customer_reviews.author: Jason Paul Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Huge Screen!
customer_reviews.text: Finally had to upgrade and picked this Desktop to replace my old HP all-in-one with Windows 7. Very pleased with the transition. As always, new systems are very fast at first, and this is no exception. So far I love this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Miata Man

customer_reviews.title: Look in mouse to find USB dongle
customer_reviews.text: some people are saying the USB dongle is missing .... it is in the mouse when you take the cap off to put the batteries in Hope this is helpful to some people who think the dongle is missing
customer_reviews.author: abdurrahman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a fantastic computer for a great price. Don't buy if you are a heavy gamer but if you stream video / watch live TV it works great! And obviously for basic daily activities as well...
customer_reviews.author: jonnyjack1126

customer_reviews.title: Used Equipment - Returned, repaired and sold as New
customer_reviews.text: This product had been originally purchased by someone else in 2018 and was returned to Acer for a refund because the operating system software and/or unit itself were faulty. It was resold from the original manufacturer by Amazon as a brand new computer, which was not the case. The equipment did not work and had to be returned once again. Amazon did refund the purchase price and pay for return shipping. The experience was disappointing as the purchase was a gift for an elderly person. No indication from Amazon that the item was used/refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Fairly low in performance.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to rely on overclocking to add speed. That's OK with a spreadsheet, but not so great for anyone that wants to use a mouse cursor. It's faster than the 8 year old HP that I was replacing, but has some serious drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: FranB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The computer is amazing. Picture quality is really good. Has a good amount of storage and it runs pretty fast. Only complaint is the sound quality isn't great. I just plugged it into my Bose speaker though and it sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to use and all in one for my elderly parents.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and convenient for everyday tasks (web browsing, email, YouTube). Especially great for elders, as the computer is very compact and feature-packed.
customer_reviews.author: George M

customer_reviews.title: DIED AFTER 6 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: This computer has been laggy since I bought it. It causes the keyboard to freeze and then presses a bunch of random letters at a time. Now after only 6 months it just turned off while I was using it and will not turn back on> Now I am being told I have to send it out to Acer and pay for the shipping costs which will be about $50. Don't buy this all in one. Look elsewhere and get something better that will last longer than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Trent

customer_reviews.title: KEYBOARD DIED
customer_reviews.text: So far the computer has worked well, has issues handling many photos on same page, Keyboard died, replaced batteries 4 times no good. bad keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fine Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a computer that goes beyond all expectations. I tried other brands and this computer surpasses all. I'm very satisfied. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Oliver

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PC !!!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful PC in such a small package ! Easy to get going with it because there is only ONE wire ! Beautiful picture on screen - very fast computer for an AIO
customer_reviews.author: David Keylon

customer_reviews.title: Great color, started up perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a stand alone for adobe illustrator and it is doing its job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MaryannGA

customer_reviews.title: Great Spec, awesome value
customer_reviews.text: It’s incredible that you can get 8th gen intel i5 CPU and 12G RAM for this price. The thin bezel display looks great and has good image quality. The mechanical hard drive can be easily upgraded to an SSD. It took me less than 10 minutes following instructions on youtube. I hope the mouse/keyboard can match the sleek silver design of the computer but for the price, I’m not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Dayu Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This computer is a good buy for the money. Issues and glitches from earlier Win 10 machines appear to have been addressed. This is not a super fast computer and not recommended for gaming, but for basic everyday use it does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Sven E. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: slow as a snell
customer_reviews.text: slow and screen keeps going black while using on support for an hour already
customer_reviews.author: rls exhaust

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It !
customer_reviews.text: The Sound quality is very bad, picture quality is also very bad and if you’re lucky enough to get a mouse and a keyboard you won’t get the usb to connect it to the pc.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Andujar

customer_reviews.title: Nice, for non-apple product.
customer_reviews.text: I am typically and Apple person, but this all in one is nice. I’d like to see more USB ports. There are only 4.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: The worst computer I have ever purchased!!! Had for a year and 2 months and mother board went out. Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine holloway

customer_reviews.title: No disc drive
customer_reviews.text: Great computer but it doesn't come with a disk drive you need to be prepared for that and buy an aftermarket disk drive with USB cable
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Never ever consider this PC
customer_reviews.text: Never think about purchasing this PC, it is slower than 15yrs old 486 PC. If I were Acer engineer it would have been much harder to make it slow like this, One you click google chrome browser, it takes one minute to pop up, I have no other s/w installed yet. Can’t imagine how they made it slow like this. New technology. Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K.

customer_reviews.title: tech support
customer_reviews.text: Teck support had limited knowledge and she could not solve my problem even with the help of top technician!.
customer_reviews.author: Djan Irani

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and "marvelus"
customer_reviews.text: I just love this! I am so glad that l purchased this desktop. The very first computer l purchased years ago was an acer. I took a chance ordering online but l am thrilled. The last laptops l purchased were very disappointing. This acer is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Diane Albarella   it was fantastic!

customer_reviews.title: Hard Drive crashed
customer_reviews.text: The computer has been fine for running cloud based programs. Simple and easy to use. Hard drive crashed after 1 1/2 years. Acer support was horrible and not helpful at all. Wasted 2 1/2 hours on the phone and $140.00 for no help at all. I would avoid Acer support and take this to a local repair shop for issues.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: great value - love this unit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade my wife's computer and she loves the larger display and ease of use and that it doesn't clutter the desktop! BTW - I love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this all in one, first one delivered the display didn't work! They sent a replacement and it worked for a month or so then it started freezing up. Called service and they walked me through a trouble shoot and it seemed to help. Now a month later every time I try to play a video the display goes blank and freezes. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: missing part
customer_reviews.text: the key board and mouse will not function without the plug in device that they didn't send. My 849.00 computer is worthless if i can't operate it the key board and mouse are wireless and need a device plugged into the computer in order for the key board and mouse to work, that device did not come with the computer
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Price

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s a faster start up. Thought it was a touch screen it isn’t not sure where I read it wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Flip Flop

customer_reviews.title: A very Stylish & pretty computer
customer_reviews.text: Were still learning everything on the computer, but so far we love it...stylish & fast...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great for simple home computer
customer_reviews.text: Very simple set-up, does what it it supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: KBLegalBeagle

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended- All-in-one desktop
customer_reviews.text: The product is damn slow in it’s performance. Although it’s an intel i5 machine but it’s performance doesn’t match the specs. It looks like I am working on a 90s machine. I bought this to be able to efficiently remote work but it really slows down your pace. I would not recommend this to any person looking to get even a decent performing all-in-one.
customer_reviews.author: RKB

customer_reviews.title: avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.text: Biggest piece of garbage, never worked as advertised and a few days after a year it stopped turning on at all!! Of course no warranty and now no computer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've never really liked all-in-one computers but this one looks pretty solid
customer_reviews.author: dudebuyingstuff

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it thank u, if u like load sound u do have to buy speakers for the computer it’s it’s very low
customer_reviews.author: shairon

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Part of the screen was darker than the rest. Not worth the money. Bought a computer from centaur computers instead. Got a much better deal. Only $100 more and performs at least 3x better
customer_reviews.author: Zane Mills

customer_reviews.title: Acer Aspire Desktop
customer_reviews.text: I have not been using this computer very long but so far I am very pleased with it. I previously had a laptop but find that I am more comfortable using a desktop computer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good ! Thank you !
customer_reviews.text: The computer is terrific ! It is very fast and VERY SILENT !!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Sinyukov

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this PC on sale in an emergency as I teach online for a living. It has a great speed and boots right up. I've never had any issue with it being bogged down or slow.
customer_reviews.author: ahartwig

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Clarity is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Mac user and this is easy and friendly to use. Screen is perfect size! Super easy to setup and use immediately!!
customer_reviews.author: chicbear

customer_reviews.title: Computer Works as advertised !!
customer_reviews.text: I was cautious about purchasing a computer online, but I have had this for a couple months now and no problems at ALL!! I am very pleased. I did not give 5 out of 5 stars, just because the computer did not EXCEED my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift. Wife and kids love it. Much faster than our previous computer. Internal speakers could be better, but overall very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G Buchsen

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 7 mos
customer_reviews.text: The computor broke in 7 mos. Tried to get help but the individual on the phone was indiscernible because of accent..then hung up.Thought I had warranty ...very disappointed in Amazon and Acer support! Very expensive lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Nice large screen, saves room with no tower to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Son Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a family computer
customer_reviews.text: I love our computer. Fast, beautiful and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy -- died within a two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed -- worked for less than two weeks than stopped booting up entirely. None of the suggestions from customer support were able to resolve the issue, and they did not replace the unit. What a waste! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: They lie
customer_reviews.text: I got ripped off by Acer repair. My computer screen stopped working. They said a liquid was spilled on it. It is a desktop with the screen mounted on a stand. How the heck do you spill a liquid on it. Dont buy anything from Acer. Total liars
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t suggest it at all
customer_reviews.text: Using Acer AIO for the first time. Beautiful but super slow. Generally, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Hamid

customer_reviews.title: Videos???What videos
customer_reviews.text: It won't play the simplest videos recorded off another device. I paid 600 for this piece of crap. I can afford to toss it in the trash after just 1 week of use. NEVER AGAIN WILL I BUY AN ACER PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why but it won't turn on or work anymore. Got it September 2 and It's January 28 and it won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Proffitt

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: i love the acer all in one pc i only use it for music production and recording and out of all of the computers ive had in the past this one tops em all
customer_reviews.author: Grimey G

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working After 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Was generally slow but I dealt with it since I got it for such a good price and I liked the design. Now it won’t power on all the way so I have to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Tequion

customer_reviews.title: All in one!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that's not good.... The spound. The speakers are teeny tiny n you can't hear anything! Thank God for wireless speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase this computer!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is JUNK! I will never, ever purchase another ACER computer. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Miss part
customer_reviews.text: I can not find usb Bluetooth and box for keyboard and mouse
customer_reviews.author: M.A

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire C24-865-ACi5NT AIO Desktop, 23.8" Full HD, 8th Gen Intel Core i5-8250U, 12GB DDR4, 1TB HDD, 802.11ac WiFi, Wireless Keyboard and Mouse, Windows 10 Home
product_meta.description: Style:PC onlyAcer Aspire C24-865-ACi5NT AIO 23.8" Desktop comes with these specs: 8th Generation Intel Core i5-8250U Processor 1.6GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 3.4GHz, 23.8" Full HD (1920 x 1080) widescreen edge-to-edge LED Back-lit display, Windows 10 Home, 12GB DDR4 2400MHz Memory, Intel UHD Graphics 620, 1TB 5400Rpm SATA Hard Drive, high-definition audio support, 2 - USB 3.1 (Type A) Gen 1 port (Rear), 2 - USB 2.0 port (Rear), 1 - HDMI-out port (Rear), 802.11AC Wi-Fi, 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN (RJ-45 port), Bluetooth 4.3LE, wireless keyboard and optical mouse, 6.9 lbs. | 3.13 kg (system unit only), 1 Year Parts and Labor Limited Warranty with Toll Free Tech Support (DQ.Bbuaa.004).
feature_bullets: 8th Generation Intel Core i5 8250U Processor 1.6GHz (Up to 3.4GHz); Operating System Architecture: 64 bit
23.8 inches Full HD (1920 x 1080) Widescreen Edge to Edge LED Back lit Display
802.11ac Wi Fi, Gigabit Ethernet LAN & Bluetooth 4.2LE
Built in Stereo Speakers; External 1 MP Webcam (via USB Connector); Wireless Keyboard and Mouse.Power Supply:65 W
